messages.subject: Re: beans and babies in the store
messages.messageBody:
<<<<Ah - memories.....

As soon as we got to the grocery store we'd go to the
bags of dry beans
and
split peas and stuff like that. They'd pick out a
"baby." They cuddle
and
play with their bag of beans all through the store -
talk to it and
sing to
it and so on. I don't know how this whole thing
started - I think it
was by
accident with my oldest and she passed it down to the
younger kids.

--pam>>>>

That is too cute! My dd always takes her baby doll to
the store with us and pushes the cart (until it gets
too full!) with said baby in the child/infant seat.
Sometimes she likes to pretend that she doesn't know
me and that she's just another "grown up" that just
'happens' to be in the same aisle as me as we go
along. We get some pretty strange looks, but what's
new!

Meghan
